channel.title: Magic-System on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Magic-System on My New Hugo Site

item.description: Strands of energies, stretching across space and time. Like strings pinned down, they tangle up and straighten again. One of the many shapes of Amarisk- yet not woven of Twilit. Unique in their own ways, these threads connect places and planets. Soaring heights and hills cause ties and tangle, plains soothe the weave.
